resources.string: [THIS IS A TEST] This is a test Emergency Alert

Triggering the distinctive alert tone from this test app in public places may be mistaken for a real emergency and cause unnecessary panic. Please use responsibly for testing purposes only in private settings.
Unique ID for the alert message (0-65535). Changing this allows sending multiple distinct alerts.
Overrides the default category (e.g., 4352 for Earthquake). Leave empty to use default based on alert level.
Message priority. 0=Normal, 3=Emergency (User Alert). Higher priority may interrupt user activities.
Geographical scope of the alert. 0=Cell-wide, 1=PLMN-wide, 2=Location Area, 3=Network-wide.
Encoding of the message. 0=GSM 7-bit default alphabet. Consult 3GPP TS 23.038 for others.
Target SIM slot index (0 for SIM1, 1 for SIM2). Determines which subscription receives the broadcast.
ISO 639-1 language code (e.g., \'en\', \'zh\'). Used for data coding scheme auto-selection if DCS is 0.
Attempts to launch Google Play Services\' internal earthquake alert demo UI.
This app requires a root manager (like Magisk/KernelSU) to trigger alerts via GUI.\n\nIf you only have ADB Root, please use the command line method described in README.

This feature requires the Xposed module to be active.\n\nPlease enable this app in LSPosed/EdXposed Manager, ensure the scope includes "Google Play Services" (com.google.android.gms), and reboot your device.

Configure simulated earthquake details injected into GMS EAlertUxArgs:

• Region Name (field o): Displayed in alert title.
• Lat/Lng (field b): Epicenter location.
• Distance (field e): Simulated distance from epicenter.
• Radius: Generates red/yellow polygon areas (field f/l).
Requires Xposed module active in GMS scope.

You are about to trigger a simulated emergency alert. This will play a loud, distinctive alert tone.

Please ensure:
1. You are in a private environment.
2. People around you are aware that this is a test.
Simulates a real-world scenario where multiple alert systems trigger simultaneously. Includes WEA, ETWS, and Google Earthquake Alert.

[TEST ALERT]【EARTHQUAKE WARNING】Test Province, Test County, Test Town will experience a 6.8 magnitude earthquake on Jan 1, 1970 at 07:00. Depth: 20km. Epicenter: 37.7749°N, -122.4194°E. Radius: 100km. Indoors: Drop, Cover, Hold on. Outdoors: Move to open area. Emergency: 112. Seismic Bureau: 02112345678. Visit example.com [TEST ALERT]
